message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with its value to me.

Bob, I understand your offer. While $12000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to compromise a little.  I can accept $13000 for the product. This would still be a good deal for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
